Phone: [PHONE]
**Summary:**
[EDUCATION]
**Experience:**
**Internal Audit Specialist – Luxury Goods Co. (2018-2025)**
* Conducted comprehensive operational and financial audits, identifying control weaknesses.
* Developed risk matrix and provided recommendations to mitigate compliance risks (SOX).
* Prepared detailed audit findings and presented them to the Audit Committee.
[EDUCATION]
* Monitored the implementation of remediation plans across departments.
**Skills:**
Internal Auditing, Risk Management, SOX Compliance, Financial Reporting, Data Analysis

[NAME]
Email: [[EMAIL]](mailto:[EMAIL])
Phone: [PHONE]
**Summary:**
[EDUCATION]
**Experience:**
**Watch Movement Designer – Precision Horology (2017-2025)**
* Designed and engineered new mechanical complications using advanced CAD tools.
* Built functional prototypes and performed stress testing on watch movements.
* Collaborated with materials science teams to select innovative alloys.
[EDUCATION]
* Documented manufacturing specifications and assembly procedures.
**Skills:**
Mechanical Engineering, CAD (CATIA), Prototyping, Kinematics, Materials Science, Design Innovation

[NAME]
Email: [[EMAIL]](mailto:[EMAIL])
Phone: [PHONE]
**Summary:**
[EDUCATION]
**Experience:**
**Retail Boutique Manager – Fine Jewelry (2016-2025)**
* Managed all aspects of store P&L, operations, and visual merchandising.
* Recruited, trained, and led a high-performing sales team of 8 associates.
* Achieved annual sales targets, consistently ranking in the top 5 boutiques nationally.
[EDUCATION]
* Cultivated VIP client relationships through personalized clienteling strategies.
**Skills:**
Retail Management, P&L Oversight, Team Leadership, Clienteling, Visual Merchandising, Luxury Sales

[NAME]
Email: [[EMAIL]](mailto:[EMAIL])
Phone: [PHONE]
**Summary:**
[EDUCATION]
**Experience:**
**Compensation & Benefits Coordinator – Global Firm (2019-2025)**
* Managed end-to-end payroll processing for multi-state employees (ADP).
* Administered all employee benefits (health, 401k) and managed annual open enrollment.
* Reconciled payroll accounts and prepared GL entries for the finance team.
[EDUCATION]
* Ensured timely and accurate compliance with all employment tax regulations.
**Skills:**
Payroll Processing (ADP), Benefits Administration, HRIS, Tax Compliance, GL Reconciliation, Communication

Email: [[EMAIL]](mailto:[EMAIL])

* Ensured customs compliance and prepared all necessary import/export documentation.
[EDUCATION]
* Developed KPI reports on delivery timeliness and cost efficiency.
**Skills:**
Logistics Management, International Distribution, Import/Export, Customs Compliance, 3PL Management, KPI Reporting

**Cybersecurity & Risk Lead – Financial Tech (2015-2025)**

[EDUCATION]

**Skills:**
Cybersecurity, IT Compliance (GDPR, SOC 2), Risk Assessment, Incident Response, Policy Development, Network Security

**Social Media Content Creator – Lifestyle Brand (2020-2025)**

[EDUCATION]
